text:
全新色调焕新标志性款型。 彰显品牌DNA的典范之作，面料采用珠光粉亮漆面尼龙制成，点缀标志性长方格绗缝。 跨越季节与时尚的经典短款设计，具有个性鲜明的轮廓、可拆卸风帽和可调节下摆。 衣袖饰以品牌标志性的经典贴袋以及专为庆祝70周年而设计的拼贴徽标。
尺码：1-2-3-4-5
颜色：黑色、白色、薰衣草紫、玄武灰
羽绒：90%白鸭绒
trans:
A new color palette refreshes the iconic style. It's an exemplary piece highlighting the brand's DNA. Crafted from pearlescent pink lacquered nylon, it's embellished with signature chevron quilting. A classic short design that transcends seasons and fashions, featuring a distinctive silhouette, detachable hood and adjustable hem. The sleeves are finished with the brand's iconic classic patch pockets and a collage of logos specifically designed to celebrate its 70th anniversary.
Sizes: 1-2-3-4-5
Colors: Black, White, Lavender Purple, Basaltic Gray
Down material: 90% white duck down
